text: Google Calendar events have start and end times. Events may overlap unless explicitly checked. Event IDs uniquely identify calendar entries. Calendar queries require time ranges or search keywords.
Meetings cannot overlap in time. Work hours are from 9 AM to 6 PM. Events must be scheduled only within working hours.
Meetings should not overlap. Meetings should be scheduled within working hours. Ambiguous scheduling requests should be clarified before action.
All times are interpreted in Indian Standard Time (IST). No automatic timezone conversion is performed.
All times are assumed to be in Indian Standard Time (IST). If a user query is ambiguous, the system should not make assumptions.
Calendar data must only be accessed using calendar tools. The assistant must not invent events. If calendar data is required, the appropriate tool must be called.
